Name: Multi-Tenant System
Description: Allows multiple driving schools to use the same platform with complete data isolation
Dependencies: RLS Policies, Supabase Auth, Tenant table
Key Features: Tenant registration, branding, settings, isolation via RLS

Name: Appointment Management
Description: Handles creation, editing, cancellation of driving lessons
Dependencies: Users table, Locations table, Payments table, Staff working hours
Key Features: Create/edit/cancel, staff scheduling, working hours, location management, availability slots, external calendar sync, status tracking

Name: Payment Processing
Description: Manages multiple payment methods and tracks payment status
Dependencies: Wallee API, Stripe API, Users table, Payments table, Invoices table
Key Features: Multiple payment methods, status tracking, reminders, receipt generation, discounts, vouchers, student credits, cash balance

Name: Course Management
Dependencies: Courses table, Course sessions table, Course registrations table, SARI API
Key Features: Course creation, categories, sessions, student enrollment, waitlist, SARI integration

Name: Student/Customer Management
Dependencies: Users table, Documents table, Credits table, Payments table
Key Features: Profiles, documents, credit tracking, payment history, appointment history, evaluation

Name: Authentication & Security
Description: Secure user authentication with multiple methods
Dependencies: auth.users table, WebAuthn credentials, MFA methods, Login attempts table
Key Features: Password auth, WebAuthn/Passkeys, Multi-Factor Authentication, login tracking, IP blocking, account lockout

Name: Booking System
Description: Public booking platform for new customers
Dependencies: Availability slots, Booking proposals, Locations, Staff
Key Features: Public booking pages, availability checking, slot reservation, guest bookings, proposals

Name: Staff Management
Dependencies: Users table, Staff working hours, Locations table, Appointments table
Key Features: Profiles, working hours, location assignments, appointment stats, cash tracking, evaluation

Name: SARI Integration
Description: Synchronizes VKU/PGS courses and student data from SARI system
Dependencies: SARI API, Courses table, Course registrations, SARI mapping tables
Key Features: Course sync, student enrollment sync, FABERID mapping, sync logging, test/prod environments

Name: Reminder System
Dependencies: Payment reminders table, SMS logs, Email service, Twilio, Resend
Key Features: Payment reminders, email/SMS/push, multi-stage, templates, logging

Name: Task Management
Dependencies: Pendencies table, Users table, Appointments table

Name: Analytics & Logging
Description: Comprehensive audit trail and system logging
Dependencies: Audit logs, Error logs, Webhook logs, Analytics events
Key Features: Audit logs, error logs, webhook logs, analytics events, system metrics

Name: Invoice System
Dependencies: Invoices table, Invoice items, Payments table
Key Features: Generation, items, payment tracking, PDF export

Name: Cancellation Management
Dependencies: Cancellation policies, Cancellation reasons, Appointments table
Key Features: Policies, reasons, charge calculation, medical certificate tracking

Name: Evaluation System
Dependencies: Evaluation categories, criteria, scales, exam results, examiners table
Key Features: Categories, criteria, rating scales, exam results, examiner management

Name: Calendar Integration
Dependencies: External calendars table, ICS files, FullCalendar
Key Features: ICS sync, calendar export, appointment display, integration with external tools

Name: WebAuthn/Passkey Support
Dependencies: Webauthn credentials table, Webauthn sessions table
Key Features: Biometric auth, security keys, multi-device, credential management

Name: /api/auth/*
Key Features: Login, register, WebAuthn, password reset, MFA, current user

Name: /api/appointments/*
Key Features: Create, update, cancel, status management, payment tracking

Name: /api/payments/*
Key Features: Process payments, status check, receipts, conversions, cash handling

Name: /api/wallee/*
Key Features: Transaction creation, webhooks, payment tokens, debugging

Name: /api/booking/*
Dependencies: Availability slots, Locations, Staff, Booking proposals
Key Features: Availability, slot reservation, options, tenant lookup, proposals

Name: /api/staff/*
Key Features: Working hours, appointments, statistics, products, categories, ratings

Name: /api/sari/*
Dependencies: SARI API, Courses, Course registrations, User mappings
Key Features: Course sync, participant sync, student enrollment, validation

Name: /api/admin/*
Key Features: Pending appointments, payment details, student instructors, billing

Name: /api/calendar/*
Key Features: Get appointments, manage calendar, generate tokens, export ICS

Name: /api/availability/*
Dependencies: Availability slots, Availability recalc queue, Working hours

Name: /api/invoices/*
Key Features: Create, list, get, update, delete, download PDF

Name: /api/cron/*
Key Features: Payment reminders, availability recalc, calendar sync, payment recovery, message queue

Name: Auth Components
Key Features: Login, register, password reset, WebAuthn, MFA

Name: Appointment Components
Key Features: Calendar view, appointment form, status display, payment info

Name: Payment Components
Key Features: Payment form, payment status, receipt display, cash balance

Name: Availability Calculator
Dependencies: Staff working hours, Appointments, Availability slots
